data.title: Computer Science
data.description: Vocational highschool with a minor in Computer Science. Completing courses in topics such as: C, C++, C#, HTML/CSS, SQL, Microsoft Office & Adobe program suites, computer maintenance & general IT skills.

data.area: Escuela Superior de Ingeniería y Arquitectura
data.title: Civil Engineering
data.description: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering with a focus on Structural Engineering. Completing courses in fields such as: statistical analysis, management, structural/fluid/soil mechanics, geotechnics, hydraulics, materials science, sanitary & transportation works, topography, among others.

data.area: Escuela Superior de Ingeniería y Arquitectura
data.title: Cost Engineering
data.description: Postgraduate program in Computer Aided Cost Engineering in regards to Public Infrastructure Tenders. Participated in a mock-up public infrastructure tender in accordance to Mexican norms & laws. Integrating blueprints, unit prices, job site scheduling within the accompanying requirements in the needed formats.
